remarks: In Theorem *54.43 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 360, the number 1 is defined as the collection of all sets with cardinality 1 (i.e. all singletons; see ~ card1 ), so that their ` A e. 1 ` means, in our notation, ` A e. { x | ( card `` x ) = 1o } ` .  Here we show that this is equivalent to ` A ~~ 1o ` so that we can use the latter more convenient notation in ~ pm54.43 .  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2013.)
